description:
Protect your boards in transit, with oversized wheels to glide through airports and hotel lobbies. The spacious main compartment opens wide for easy access, and is lined with durable, coated polyester. A comfy padded carry strap and grab handle provide a couple of carry options, with a lockable zipper for security and oversized zipper pull loops that accommodate gloved fingers in frigid resort lots.Outer fabric is burly 600d polyester, lined with polyurethane and treated with DWR for reliable water resistance.Padded interior is lined with 600d polyester laminated with waterproof TPE.Stiff construction offers protection from rough handling.Internal straps with buckle closure keeps boards separate and secure.Roomy inner pocket with zip closure.Comfortable carry strap with padded handle.Beefy, lockable zipper.Durable, oversized wheels roll smoothly on tile, tarmac and pavement.Oversized plastic pull loops for easy opening and closing with gloved hands.Reflective logo detail.Fits boards up to 165 cm.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material
name: MEC Fresh Tracks Padded Snowboard Roller
